Sadhguru in Singapore

Checkin Information

Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

We look forward to having you at the Meet, Mingle, & Meditate event with Sadhguru in Singapore. We request you to bring a soft-copy/printout of this email when you check-in on Jan 22nd.

Date: Sunday, Jan 22, 2017
Time: 4pm to 8:45pm - Check-in starts at 1pm
Venue: Singapore EXPO, Hall 1
Contact: singapore@ishayoga.org / +65-61004064
Venue Information
How to reach the venue:
  • By MRT: Alight at EXPO MRT Station and take Exit A
  • By Bus: 12, 24 and 38
  • Map: Link
Parking
  • Public Car Park (accessible to cars only) is available
  • Please note we have arranged for subsidized parking coupons with the venue: $12/- per day (Single Entry). These coupons will be available on a first-come first-serve basis at the General Help Desk.
Click here for further information on directions to the venue.
Guidelines amd Useful Information
Checking-in:
  • Upon arrival at EXPO, proceed to Registration counter for checkin outside EXPO Hall 1.
  • Checkin counters will open at 1:00 PM and you need to be seated inside the hall by 3:45 PM. Once the event starts, to avoid disturbance to other participants, you will be seated in last bays.
  • Carry your photo ID, with name matching the name on the E-Ticket.
  • Seating is on first come first serve basis within your bay.
  • If ticket has been transferred and the transfer details have not been informed to us, please bring an signed authorisation letter from the original participant with your name and e-ticket number.
On-Spot Registrations & Upgrades:
  • New tickets can be booked on the spot from 1PM to 4PM on Sunday at the 'Walk-in registration's counter. Same applies if you wish to upgrade your seating category.
Additional notes
  • Please note that the program is open only for ages 15 and above.
    However if you have an interested participant between ages 12-15 years, you can proceed to help desk to check if they can participate in the program.
